projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Carousell Android App Features
projects.description: Developed features to improve user experience and platform stability, including video support, secure authentication, and microservices integration.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

projects.title: VMware Workspace ONE App Features
projects.description: Developed app features and enhancements using Kotlin, adhering to clean architecture and MVVM patterns.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience developing RESTful APIs using Django and DRF.
Explain your approach to optimizing database queries in Django applications.
How do you ensure proper authentication and authorization in your API designs?
Describe your experience with Celery and message queues.
Explain how you would implement unit and integration tests for a Django API endpoint.
How have you used Redis in previous projects? What were the use cases?
Explain a scenario where you had to troubleshoot a performance bottleneck in a Django application.
Given an array of integers, write a function to find the largest product of any three numbers in the array.
